attributes.action: Review the govt guidance on the law for creating intentional settlements
attributes.additional_details: More and more people are seeking a more harmonious existence with nature. Many more are looking to join or establish permaculture based lifes/communities. There is currently no support for this and hence these settlements are deemed illegal. We would like the govt to review this and establish a process that would allow these settlements and support their commitment to aiding the rewilding of the land around these eco villages
attributes.background: We would like the govt to provide an affordable route for small groups and/or housing co-ops to establish intentional eco communities to live organically and steward/rewild the land similar to but not the same as the welsh one planet directive

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
